reviewText: IF you like good movies with a touch of Drama Adventure Romance you can't go by and old classic Never Let Me Go starring two great actors Clark Gable and Gene Tierney. The story boy loves girl boy can't have girl boy gets girl or some thing like that,you need to watch the movie. I have had this movie in my library for over thirty years and found I could buy the dvd from Amazons UK.Its a good movie for a cold rainy weekend when you just want to snuggle up with a bottle of wine a ragging fire and enjoy an old movie. PS.This movie is in black and white and looks great. ENJOY.
